scripts.png: FILETYPE=png node src/index.js && parcel build output/*.png --no-cache --no-optimize
scripts.web: npm run png && parcel serve src/web/index.html
scripts.install-fonts: if [ ! -d ~/.fonts ]; then mkdir ~/.fonts; fi && cp assets/zcool-gdh.ttf ~/.fonts
scripts.build: npm run png && parcel build src/web/index.html
